participant_1.background:
I usually listen to music to cheer myself up.
i like to plant flowers in my gardens.
I will share my love for hamburgers with others through my let's plays.
I sometimes play with my guns in a dangerous way.
I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to sew and create clothes that are both stylish and unique.
I love to work with my hands and create things.
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party.
I am single and enjoy my independence.

content.text: I'm doing very well today. How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I'm really excited to be talking to you today.
Thank you, I'm glad to hear that. What are you interested in talking about?
I would love to hear about your experience at Mardi Gras.
Mardi Gras is a really special time of year in New Orleans. It's a time for celebration and fun.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go to New Orleans.
You should definitely go sometime. It's a great city.
I will definitely keep that in mind. What else do you enjoy doing?
I love to sew and create clothes. I'm really proud of my ability to make stylish and unique clothing.
That's really cool. I wish I could sew.
It's not that hard to learn. There are a lot of great resources available online.
I might have to look into that. I've always wanted to be able to make my own clothes.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in New Orleans?
I love to go to the parades. They're so much fun and there's always a great energy in the air.
I can imagine. I love parades.
Mardi Gras is definitely a one-of-a-kind experience.
It sounds like it. I'm definitely going to have to go sometime
